title: Uniswap Token List
description: Schema for lists of tokens compatible with the Uniswap Interface

Version.title: Version
Version.description: A version number for a piece of data, used in list change detection

major.description: The major version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are removed from the list or token addresses are changed.

minor.description: The minor version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are added to the list.

patch.description: The patch version of the list. Must be incremented for any changes to the list.

TagIdentifier.title: Tag Identifier
TagIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of a tag

TagDefinition.title: Tag Definition
TagDefinition.description: Definition of a tag that can be associated with a token via its identifier

description.description: A user-friendly description of the tag

examples.name: Stablecoin
examples.description: A token with value pegged to another asset

TokenInfo.title: Token Info
TokenInfo.description: Metadata for a single token in a token list

chainId.title: Chain ID
chainId.description: The chain ID of the Ethereum network where this token is deployed

address.title: Token Address
address.description: The checksummed address of the token on the specified chain ID

decimals.title: Token Decimals
decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token balance

symbol.title: Token Symbol
symbol.description: The symbol for the token; must be alphanumeric

logoURI.title: Token Logo URI
logoURI.description: A URI to the token logo asset; if not set, interface will attempt to find a logo based on the token address; suggest SVG or PNG of size 64x64

tags.title: Token Tag List
tags.description: An array of tag identifiers associated with the token; tags are defined at the list level

name.title: Token List Name
name.description: The name of the token list

timestamp.title: List Version Timestamp
timestamp.description: The timestamp of this list version; i.e. when this immutable version of the list was created

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: The list of tokens included in the list

keywords.title: List Keywords
keywords.description: Keywords associated with the contents of the list; may be used in list discoverability

tags.title: Tag ID Mapping
tags.description: A mapping of tag identifiers to their name and description

stablecoin.name: Stablecoin
stablecoin.description: A token with value pegged to another asset

logoURI.title: List Logo URI
logoURI.description: A URI for the logo of the token list; prefer SVG or PNG of size 256x256
